last_episode_to_air.name: 1X01
last_episode_to_air.overview: EL PRINCIO CUANDO SE CONVIERTEN EN BUCHONAS DE NARCOS

name: Las Buchonas
overview: It revolves around Aurora, Yuliana, Manuela and Tabatha, four women seduced by power and money. Aurora's life changes the day the authorities unfairly kill her father. Once a citizen of Tierra Blanca, she became the leader of a group of women who rebelled against an unjust patriarchy.
